author: gstein
msg: Add the new editor interface to svn_delta, and adjust some APIs to
The new editor interface sports a number of changes from the old
+ baton construction functions take a pool argument
+ iterative functions (delete_entry and change_*_prop) now take a pool
+ NAME parameter has been replaced with a PATH parameter, and the type
has changed from stringbuf to char*
+ copyfrom_path argument types were changed from stringbuf to char*
+ change_*_prop NAME and VALUE params changed their type
* svn_delta.h (svn_delta_editor_t): new editor structure. it was
defined in-place over the old structure to clarify the
diffs. added a bunch of docco on pool usage, relative to the
(svn_delta_edit_fns_t): re-added the old structure devoid of all
(svn_delta_compat_wrap): new function declaration for wrapping a
new-style editor into an old-style wrapper.
(svn_delta_default_editor): return type changed to the new-style
renamed from svn_delta_default_editor(). implementation tweaked to
